posts.text:
Rosa Parks was born 113 years ago today. Her simple act of bravery sparked a movement for justice.

Rosa Parks is a powerful reminder that change takes courage. Today, we honor her legacy.

replies.text:
Act of Defiance

Rosa Parks was a civil rights activist who sparked the Montgomery bus boycott in 1955 by refusing to give her seat to a white passenger.
     #CivilRights
This act of defiance helped launch the civil rights movement.
#BlackHistory 

Remembering,
on her birthday, Feb 4
Rosa Parks❤️🇺🇸
Let Congress carry on that act of bravery and start standing up against Trump and his regime.
